head.title:
Dallas Fire Rescue
DFR

div.p: We strive to provide the citizens of Dallas the most effective and rapid emergency, fire, rescue and prevention services
Our department exists to provide the citizens of Dallas the most effective and rapid emergency, fire, rescue, and prevention services in an ever-changing environment.
Dallas Fire-Rescue exists to provide the citizens of Dallas the most effective and rapid emergency, fire, rescue, and prevention services in an ever-changing environment.
Our mission is to prevent and suppress fires, educate and rescue citizens, provide emergency medical services, promote public safety and foster community relations.
To be the best trained, technologically advanced, customer-focused fire service organization in the country.
DFR is dedicated to openness, transparency, and accountability. Explore our up-to-date measures and data.
Are you looking for recruiting information?
Have a question, concern or commendation?
View & download instructions & forms to request EMS Ambulance Records & the Notice of Privacy Practice. Call {{medicalContact.WorkPhone}} for more information.
